Docs.summary: Defines a method that enables controls to obtain client-side script options.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Classes that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPostBackContainer> interface enable buttons to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions> object that is used to create the correct postback event reference.
For more information about postback processing, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Server Control Event Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3).
Controls that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPostBackContainer> interface should also implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> interface to handle events raised by contained buttons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Implementations of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPostBackContainer.GetPostBackOptions%2A> method should configure a new <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions> instance with the information required for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%2A> method to construct a valid postback event reference, which, when executed on the client, initiates a postback.
